bibl.title: Texts, Contexts, Subtexts and Interpretative Frameworks. Beyond the Parochial and toward (Dynamic) Modeling of the Ptolemaic Economy. Avec résumé en anglais.
Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning
bibl.author: MANNING, Joseph G.

bibl.note: Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. [- Introduction.] - Papyrology, or where we've been. - Graeco-Roman Egypt, the "ancient economy" and some theoretical questions. - Archaeology, or where we should go. - Conclusions.
MANNING Joseph G., Texts, Contexts, Subtexts and Interpretative Frameworks. Beyond the Parochial and toward (Dynamic) Modeling of the Ptolemaic Economy. Avec résumé en anglais.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor-in-Chief), Jennifer E. GATES, Andrew T. WILBURN (Guest Editors), Timothy RENNER, John WHITEHORNE (Editors), Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning = BASP 42 (2005) Special Thematic Section, pp. 235-256.
